definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Through foreplay, you need to get her wet before intercourse can take place.
sentences.chinese: 前戏结束之后，在交合之前，你应该让她“湿”了。

sentences.english: When a man lies with a woman and there is an emission of semen, both must bathe with water, and they will be unclean till evening.
sentences.chinese: 若男女交合，两个人必不洁净到晚上，并要用水洗澡。

sentences.english: A whole generation may be less able to connect erotically to real women.
sentences.chinese: 整整一代人可能更少人能和真正的女人交合。

sentences.english: Milton's angels in an act of sexual union are fully smooshed together.
sentences.chinese: 弥尔顿笔下的天使两性交合之时是完全融合在一起的。

definition: to have cordial relations with each other/to have sexual intercourse
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
lit. cloud and rain/fig. sexual intercourse
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
